name: My mother told me...
description:
Hello everyone.

This is my 4th time here at LD jam, first time in solo (unfortunately :cry: ) and too slow to participate in COMPO.

I will integrate information here since I could not build an in game tutorial in time.

Plot

You've been told by your mother to collect a variety of flowers that grows only in a dangerous forest because "you know, these are THEIR favorite flowers".

You must be aware to bandits and traps during your journey. 

The only thing you can use is a quick dash ability to juke the enemies.

Hope you'll have fun.

Later I will integrate some missing utility.

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE to dash

E to harvest
